attributes.action: Command Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty is signed by the end of September 2016.
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, command the next Prime Minster of the UK to sign Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty, no later than the end of September 2016.
This is to ensure that the democratic, first past the post, result of the UK EU Referendum is carried out.

The voices of 17,410,742 voters have spoken.
